The following content is commit messages. Your task is. to make a changelog type summary so it is in order and in markdown format as follows

## [date]
[message]
By: [author]


The return output will be markdown
***below is the context to use in your summary***
Fix bug with payment system by Bob Belcher on 2024-06-04 12:34
Update the controller to handle the webhook by Alfred Nutile on 2024-06-01 12:34
